formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: State Tax T_s = I_t \times r_s, \quad \text{where } r_s = 0 \text{ for Alaska} Local Tax T_\ell = I_t \times r_\ell, \quad \text{where } r_\ell = 0 \text{ (no local income tax)} Total State+Local = T_s + T_\ell = 0 Effective State Rate e_s = \begin{cases} \dfrac{T_s}{I_t}\times 100\%, & I_t > 0 \\ 0\%, & I_t = 0 \end{cases} Net After State Tax = I_t - T_s = I_t PFD State Tax = \text{PFD} \times r_s = 0

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
